verses.roman:
āra dina mahāprabhu nija-gaṇa lañā
jagannātha dekhilena śayyotthāne yāñā

synonyms: āra dina—the next day; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; nija-gaṇa lañā—accompanied by His personal devotees; jagannātha dekhilena—saw Lord Jagannātha; śayyā-utthāne—at the time of rising early from bed; yāñā—going.
translation: The next day, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu went with His personal devotees to see Lord Jagannātha when Lord Jagannātha arose early in the morning.
